ygData.messageBody:
> <Snip> On the up side, you CAN charm a PK(or fear them for that matter)
> and have your level 50 wizard friends zap the hell out of a player they
> could otherwise not hit since they have a linkdead "flag" set upon becoming
> charmed or feared. Now THERE's some bard revenge for you. <snip>
>
> I'm think of trying a bard on the race war server. Could you explain what
> you mean by this statement, especially 'linkdead flag'? Thanks.

I'll try, as I was a victim of this rather awful bug a few days ago. Currently,
when your character is charmed or feared by another played, you become, for
all intensive purposes, an NPC. Normally, Rallos Zek has a +/- 4 levels attack
limit in effect - I'm level 26, so no one higher than 30 should be able to attack
me.
But, while under the fear spell a level 30 necro cast on me, I was very quickly
slaughtered by her level 35+ druid friend. (Thank goodness friends were nearby
to loot me, whew!) Another annoying side effect of this bug is that if you die
while feared or charmed, you are disconnected from the server and have to re log in.

After numerous petitions, a guide informed me this was a known bug and would
be fixed the next patch. (hah!) Given Verants track record with PvP bugs, I'm not
holding my breath... but at least I can fear them before they fear me now. :)

Lohengrin Windstrider
-bard of Rallos Zek
